original_title: Destiny's Child: The Platinum's on the Wall
overview: The very first single from Destiny's Child was "No, No, No." Soon after its release, the single jumped to the top of the charts and went platinum, introducing to the world the group that would soon claim The Top Selling Female Group title. Destiny's Child's sophomore album, The Writing's On The Wall, has sold over six million copies in the U.S. alone and yielded four #1 singles. One after another "Bills, Bills, Bills," "Bug A Boo," "Say My Name" and "Jumpin, Jumpin" topped the singles charts and became the hottest jams in the clubs and the streets.  1. No, No, No Part 1  2. No, No, No Part 2 (featuring Wyclef Jean)  3. Bills, Bills, Bills  4. Bug A Boo  5. Say My Name  6. Jumpin, Jumpin (So So Def Remix)
title: Destiny's Child: The Platinum's on the Wall
